item.title: The Scarcity Brain
item.description: Idea 01: How Social Media is a Casino The scarcity loop Casinos were a relatively small industry earlier. An entrepreneur named Si Redd revolutionized slot design Addictive loop Opportunity The person has to feel as if there is a chance to win something. Statistically, impossible, however the brain must feel like it has a fighting chance. Unpredictability The reward or “win” has to be given un-predictably. This keeps the player engaged.
